description: Let us in on the secrets of your Turkey-day economics.
teaser: Let us in on the secrets of your Turkey-day economics.
title: Your Wallet: Making Thanksgiving work for you
contentencoded:
This week, we're discussing how you make Thanksgiving work, financially. 

We could all probably use some help planning and budgeting for Thanksgiving.

Lynne Rosetto Kasper, host of The Splendid Table joins Lizzie O'Leary to share tips on how to save, and surprising corners  to cut.

Tune into Turkey Confidential this Thanksgiving morning for more from Lynne.

Send us an email, or reach us on Twitter, @MarketplaceWKND
